You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You awaken half-buried in snow, shivering in the frigid air and lying within the tangled wreck of your speeder. With shock, you realize that some of your companions are missing, but you quickly establish communication and discover that you've been separated.

{-} Deploy the heroes and any allies on the two blue highlights, divided between them as evenly as possible.

abilities.name: Contempt
abilities.text: While attacking, if the target does not have a HARMFUL condition, Dengar applies +1 {B} to the attack results.

eventActions.theText:
“We'll worry about extraction later,’ your companions advise. “Follow the distress signal, and we'll meet there.”

This is easier said than done, though. Snow is falling heavily, making it almost impossible to see what is just around the corner.

{-} When a Rebel figure enters a space adjacent to a green highlight, click the highlight and select "Reveal".
{-} The mission will progress when the survivor is found.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded and the Echo Base Troopers are defeated.

{-} When a Rebel figure enters a space adjacent to a green highlight, click the highlight and select "Reveal".
{-} The mission will progress when the survivor is found.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded and the Echo Base Troopers are defeated.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
Sekka's eyes open slowly, widening with sheer joy and relief when she realizes what she’s seeing. Signaling for your ship, you secure the woman for transport.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes receive the “Invigorated by Success” Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
{-} The Empire discards the “Weary from Toil” Reward card.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
The combination of the snow, the wildlife, and the Imperials is too much. You don't even know if the survivor is still alive, so you retreat.

After hours of slogging through the snow and fighting everything this wretched planet sets in your path, you reach a suitable place to call for extraction.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
{-} The Empire discards the “Weary from Toil” Reward card.

globalEvents.name: Reveal Pass
globalEvents.eventText: You struggle forward and finally climb a small pass.

eventActions.theText: Unfortunatel, enemies are already waiting for you here.

globalEvents.name: Reveal Cavern
globalEvents.eventText: You enter a large, icy cavern, your steps echoing through the silence. The signal from the distress beacon is very strong now. You must be close.

entityProperties.name: Reveal Cavern 1
entityProperties.theText:
In the dim twilight, it is impossible to see what lies beyond this point.

{-} When a Rebel figure enters a space adjacent to this highlight, click "Reveal".

entityProperties.name: Reveal Cavern 2
entityProperties.theText:
In the dim twilight, it is impossible to see what lies beyond this point.

{-} When a Rebel figure enters a space adjacent to this highlight, click "Reveal".

eventActions.theText:
A gap leads from the cavern into another cave.

{-} The wall adjacent to the difficult terrain in the Cave or the Cavern does not block movement, line of sight, adjacency, or counting spaces.

At the far end of the cavern, you can see the body of Onderonian scout Sekka Kanvu. She lies half-buried in the snow, blankets wrapped around her. A distress beacon next to her transmits the signal you picked up. Sekka is pale and motionless. It is impossible to see whether she is still alive.

entityProperties.name: Survivor
entityProperties.theText: Sekka Kanvu lies half-buried in snow, blankets wrapped around her. It is impossible to see whether she is still alive.

eventActions.theText: Growling, a huge, white-furred creature rises from the snow. The beast lets out an ear-splitting roar and bounds toward you. As long as this creature is here, you won't be able to look after Sekka.
{-} The Rebel mission token represents the survivor. While the <color="red">Wampa</color> is on the map, Rebel figures cannot interact with the survivor.

{-} When a Rebel figure enters a space adjacent to a green highlight, click the highlight and select "Reveal".
{-} The wall adjacent to the difficult terrain in the Cave or the Cavern does not block movement, line of sight, adjacency, or counting spaces.
{-} The Rebel mission token represents the survivor. While the <color="red">Wampa</color> is on the map, Rebel figures cannot interact with the survivor.
{-} The mission will progress when the <color="red">Wampa</color> is defeated.
{-} The mission ends when all heroes are wounded and the Echo Base Troopers are defeated.
As you ready your weapons to protect yourself against the creature, a blaster shot rings out, barely missing you. There's more trouble here, it seems.
{-} The mission will progress when the <color="red">Wampa</color> is defeated.

globalEvents.name: Reveal Cave
globalEvents.eventText: You enter a large cave filled with snow and ice.

entityProperties.name: Reveal Cave1
entityProperties.theText:
In the dim twilight, it is impossible to see what lies beyond this point.

{-} When a Rebel figure enters a space adjacent to this highlight, click "Reveal".

entityProperties.name: Reveal Cave2
entityProperties.theText:
In the dim twilight, it is impossible to see what lies beyond this point.

{-} When a Rebel figure enters a space adjacent to this highlight, click "Reveal".

eventActions.theText:
In the distance, you can see that a way leads deeper into the caverns.

{-} The wall adjacent to the difficult terrain in the Cave does not block movement, line of sight, adjacency, or counting spaces.
You hear a burst of static, then an Imperial probe droid appears behind one of the snowdrifts.

{-} When a Rebel figure enters a space adjacent to a green highlight, click the highlight and select "Reveal".
{-} The wall adjacent to the difficult terrain in the Cave does not block movement, line of sight, adjacency, or counting spaces.
{-} The mission will progress when the survivor is found.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded and the Echo Base Troopers are defeated.

globalEvents.name: Imperial Surge 1
globalEvents.eventText: In the distance, you can see the spotlights of Imperial probe droids looking for you.

globalEvents.name: Imperial Surge 2
globalEvents.eventText: In the distance, you can see the spotlights of Imperial probe droids looking for you.

globalEvents.name: Wampa defeated
globalEvents.eventText:
As the Wampa retreats with bloody fur and a painful growl, you rush over to Sekka. Her skin is cold, and there's barely any pulse. She needs help, quick.

{-} A healthy Rebel figure can interact with Sekka to try and revive her ({K} or {J}).
{-} The Rebels win when Sekka is revived.

entityProperties.name: Survivor
entityProperties.theText:
Sekka Kanvu lies half-buried in snow, blankets wrapped around her. She is barely alive.

{-} A healthy Rebel figure can interact with Sekka to try and revive her ({K} or {J}).

eventActions.theText:
{-} When a Rebel figure enters a space adjacent to a green highlight, click the highlight and select "Reveal".
{-} The wall adjacent to the difficult terrain in the Cave or the Cavern does not block movement, line of sight, adjacency, or counting spaces.
{-} The Rebel mission token represents the survivor. A healthy Rebel figure can interact with Sekka to try and revive her ({K} or {J}).
{-} The Rebels win when Sekka is revived.
{-} The mission ends when all heroes are wounded and the Echo Base Troopers are defeated.

You bend over Sekka, stimpacks and medikits in hand, and try to wrest her back from the brink of death.

{-} Test {K} or {J}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on Sekka, then discard all strain tokens on Sekka. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
Sekka's eyelids flutter. She is still alive, but barely. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on Sekka for each {B} result gained.
